name: In The Drink
description:
Are you ready to dive into a world of adventure and excitement?

Set on Christmas Eve, players take control of a deep-sea researcher and her trusty submarine to scour the depths and save aquatic creatures in need.

With a retro-inspired aesthetic and challenging metroidvania-style gameplay, In The Drink is the perfect addition to any gamer's collection.

Don't miss out on this underwater adventure - pick up your copy of In The Drink today!

Credits

Ryan Trawick (Programming, Game Design, Level Design, Art)
Twitter - Itch.io

Made for the Haunted PS1 Madvent Calendar 2022, Day 7.
